name: Cursor - Skyrim - KMV
description:
Skyrim Cursor by KMV.

Global.
32x32.

Includes two additional cursors; Black :hover and :active.
Integrated into CSS (base64) - No external mirror utilized.

Source:
1) https://tes-mods.fandom.com/wiki/The_Elder_Scrolls_Mods_Wiki
2) https://images.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110213131405/elderscrolls/es/images/9/91/CursorSkyrim.png

For Skyrim Cursor only (without extra Pointers :hover & :active), see:
https://userstyles.org/styles/176290/

Stylus recommended:
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

The rest of my themes:
https://userstyles.org/users/370722/

Contact:
https://old.reddit.com/r/KMV/

user.name: KMVerum
user.about:
/*

NOTICE:

All my Themes are designed for Stylus;
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

I stopped using Stylish in 2017 when the owner sold us out, and began selling user data:
https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/53233/announcement-to-the-community

Stylus became the fork of Stylish when this happened.

Stylish has since altered their code to the point where many old CSS standards aren't accepted anymore.
This is especially troublesome on Chrome.

As an example to this:
-My YouTube Dark Theme (as of Oct. 2019), consisted of 1459 lines and works fine in Stylus, but had 866 errors in Stylish.

The time and effort needed to correct all errors on an already working code is a no-go.
More importantly; Privacy is of much greater concern to me.

Description from Stylus website;
"Any and all analytics, telemetry, and data-collection have been removed completely."

PS; If you're on Firefox; They've done pretty much the same thing.
-Waterfox is the alternative;
https://www.waterfox.net/

My themes also work on Tor.

*/

/*
/*
/* i really want this to be global */
/* 
/* Cursor - Skyrim - KMV
/* https://userstyles.org/styles/175086/
/*
/* Cursor only (no pointers)
/* https://userstyles.org/styles/176290/
/*
/* Stylus recommended:
/* https://add0n.com/stylus.html
/* 
/* Other Themes by KMV:
/* https://userstyles.org/users/370722
/*
/* Contact:
/* https://www.reddit.com/r/KMV/
/*
*/


/* Main Cursor */

html,
body,
#main-content *
{
    cursor: url("data:image/x-icon;base64,"), default;
}

/*Experimental*/

::select,
::selection
{
  cursor: text !important;
}


/*Fullscreen Cursor Hide*/

body.navia :-moz-full-screen,
[class*="fullscreen"] [class*="inactive"],
[class*="fullscreen"][class*="inactive"],
[class*="inactive"],
.jw-flag-fullscreen.jw-flag-user-inactive div.jw-wrapper.jw-reset div.jw-media.jw-reset video.jw-video.jw-reset,
.player.player-cursor-hide,
[style="cursor: none"],
.reddit-video-player-root::after,
.ytp-autohide
{
    cursor: none!important;
}
